DOC.brief_title: Group Therapies Reducing HIV-risk Behavior Women Who Have Survived Childhood Sexual Abuse
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study evaluate effectiveness trauma-focused group therapy reduce HIV risk behavior revictimization among adult woman survivor childhood sexual abuse ( CSA ) . Research indicate childhood sexual abuse major risk factor become HIV-infected . Individuals CSA may less able benefit HIV/AIDS prevention intervention continue traumatize earlier CSA experience interfere learn safer pattern interpersonal personal functioning . This study examine whether helpful focus survivor ' memory CSA order reduce HIV risk behavior , revictimization , distress . It also examine potential mediator treatment effectiveness CSA survivor . This randomized clinical intervention trial compare trauma-focused group therapy present-focused group therapy comparison condition case-management control condition . All three group provide case management . We recruit total 192 adult woman survivor childhood sexual abuse newspaper advertisements local community organization ( e.g. , community health clinic , rape crisis center ) . All 192 research participant meet criterion posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) CSA well engage HIV risk behavior and/or experience sexual revictimization within past 3 month . These research participant recruit randomized clinical intervention trial evaluate effectiveness trauma-focused present-focused treatment condition identify mediator treatment effect . Women randomize clinical intervention trial recruit eight cohort 24 subject randomization treatment condition ( trauma-focused present-focused case management ) . Intervention subject assess behavioral psychosocial measure baseline 3- , 6- , 9- , 12-month follow-up assessment evaluate effectiveness trauma-focused treatment present-focused treatment case management control condition reduce HIV risk behavior , sexual revictimization , trauma symptom , improve interpersonal functioning . We examine three mediator treatment effectiveness , include : 1 ) trauma reactive resilient belief self world ; 2 ) differentiation integration self ; 3 ) interpersonal relation .
